verbose_text: Unlike nucleotides, experiments with 5 mM MnCl 2 both with and without GDP-fucose showed small decreases of 0.25-0.45degreesC in the DeltaT m compared to the wild type enzyme (XREF_FIG), indicating that manganese may slightly decrease the stability of CePOFUT1.
evidence: manganese may slightly decrease the stability of CePOFUT1
